channel.title: Open Source on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Sun microsystems open sources Java!
item.description: Sun microsystems this week submitted Java to two open source licenses the Common Development and Distribution License (CDDL), and the GPL v2 license. For more information please visit Sun Microsystems Project Overview located here (Free and Open Source Java Project Overview).
